name: To enable the display of HKSCS characters
description:
Unlike Firefox and IE, Google Chrome does not automatically look for characters in Mingliu_HKSCS fonts if characters are not found in the default fonts.  This can be solved by this style.
I have defaulted the fonts to Microsoft JhengHei which I find in a much clearer font in Windows 7.
css:
/* Written by dohanin */



@-moz-document 
domain("hk"),
domain("tw"),
domain("discuss.com.hk"),
domain("facekoo.com"),
domain("google.com.hk"),
domain("google.com.tw"),
domain("ithome.com.tw"),
domain("on.cc"),
domain("mobile01.com"),
domain("uwants.com"),
domain("hk.myblog.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("udn.com"),
domain("nextmedia.com"),
domain("mpinews.com"),
domain("mingpao.com"),
domain("hkheadline.com"),
domain("facebook.com")

{

* {
font-family: "Arial","Microsoft JhengHei","Mingliu_hkscs" !important;
}

pre, code, kbd, samp, var { 
font-family: "Arial","Microsoft JhengHei Bold","Mingliu_hkscs" !important;
}
}
